accommodation.location_base: NO. 2 Yangtze River Binjiang Road, Yuzhong District, Chongqing, China, 400010
accommodation.location_local: 重庆市渝中区长江滨江路2号来福士广场
accommodation.notes: Luxury 5-star hotel in Raffles City complex. Check luggage early morning (4:40am arrival). Visit observation deck before breakfast. Rate estimated at €80-100/night. Recent reviews highlight excellent breakfast variety, stunning views, and professional service.
accommodation.notes_local: 来福士综合体内的豪华五星级酒店。凌晨4:40到达先寄存行李。早餐前参观观景台。房价估计€80-100/晚。好评：早餐丰富、景色绝佳、服务专业。

accommodation.location_base: Banshan Yicheng Area A, Building 35, Unit 1902, Bazhong, Sichuan Province
accommodation.location_local: 四川省巴中市半山逸城A区35幢1902
accommodation.notes: Chinese New Year celebration with family. No cost. Staying with family. Arrive 11:00 after train from Chongqing.
accommodation.notes_local: 和家人一起过年。免费住宿。从重庆坐火车11:00到达。

accommodation.location_base: Xijin International Phase 2, Building 4, Unit 4, Room 1902 (alternate address: No. 99 Huapaifang North Street), Jinniu District, Chengdu, Sichuan Province
accommodation.location_local: 四川省成都市金牛区西锦国际二期四幢四单元1902（花牌坊北街99号）
accommodation.notes: One night stay at family home in Chengdu. No cost. Convenient for early morning panda base visit. Arrive 15:45 after train from Bazhong.
accommodation.notes_local: 成都家中住一晚。免费。方便第二天一早去熊猫基地。巴中坐火车15:45到达。

accommodation.location_local: 上海市黄浦区北京东路668号科技京城G座
accommodation.notes: New hotel (opened 2026). Boutique mid-range hotel with modern amenities. Excellent location 400m from Nanjing Road Pedestrian Street. Rate estimated at €65-85/night. Booking required for exact rates.
accommodation.notes_local: 新开业酒店（2026年开业）。精品中端酒店，设施现代。距南京路步行街400米位置极佳。房价估计€65-85/晚。需预订确认具体价格。

accommodation.notes: 13 nights total (Feb 23 - Mar 7). Estimated 4,000-6,000 RMB/month (€500-750/month). Daily rate calculated at ~€35/night for mid-range apartment. Location TBD but should be near Tsinghua/Peking University for girlfriend's classes. Book through Ziroom app (English interface available) or Airbnb China [total_for_stay: 455]

beijing.notes: Short-term rental near Tsinghua University, estimated 4,000-6,000 RMB for period

notes: All hotel check-in times are standard 14:00 (2:00 PM), check-out 12:00 noon unless noted otherwise. Family home stays (Days 2-3) are free. Beijing rental apartment cost is estimated based on short-term rental market rates in Haidian District near universities (4,000-6,000 RMB/month). Specific apartment address TBD - recommend booking through Ziroom app or Airbnb China. All hotel rates are estimates and should be confirmed on booking platforms. InterContinental Chongqing allows early luggage storage for 4:40am arrival. Shanghai SK Lusso Hotel has excellent reviews for location and comfort. Orange Hotel Beijing is budget-friendly option for one-night stay before moving to apartment.

booking_recommendations.intercontinental_chongqing: Book directly through IHG website or Trip.com/Ctrip for best rates
booking_recommendations.shanghai_sk_lusso: Book through Trip.com, Booking.com, or contact hotel directly
booking_recommendations.beijing_orange_hotel: Book through Trip.com/Ctrip (most reliable for Chinese hotel chains)
booking_recommendations.beijing_rental_apartment: Use Ziroom app (English interface) or Airbnb China. Book ASAP for 13-night stay during peak season. Ensure location is within 30 minutes of Tsinghua University for girlfriend's classes. Verify foreign passport acceptance.

important_considerations: All hotels in China require valid passport for check-in
Some hotels may require registration with local police (usually handled by hotel)
Beijing rental apartment MUST accept foreign guests - confirm before booking
Consider location of Beijing apartment relative to girlfriend's class schedule (Tue/Wed/Thu)
Book Beijing accommodation early - Chinese New Year period may have limited availability
Shanghai SK Lusso Hotel breakfast included - saves money on 4 mornings
InterContinental Chongqing breakfast is CNY 228/person - expensive, consider eating out
